Best Decision Time Frame to Lift the Lockdown
"To bring the pandemic to an end countries have to bend the curve – they have to achieve a plateau then decline in the number of daily cases." -
The chart below illustrates that a 10-day period is the best time frame to use to decide on the effectiveness of the MCO strategy in Malaysia.
The 10-day moving averages curve is more 'stable' or less erratic compared to the 5-day moving averages curve. It has no trough or acute angled peaks.
